synopsis.text: It's a musical journey with "It'll be fine!", a special medley music video from Project Pochama! This animated spectacle features the beloved Piplup and his friends, set to a heartwarming blend of ending theme songs from the renowned anime series, Pokemon Diamond & Pearl. The medley includes the melodious tracks 'Kimi no Soba de ~Hikari no Theme~', 'Ashita wa Kitto', 'Kimi no Mune ni LaLaLa', and 'Kaze no Message', all beautifully performed by Megumi Toyoguchi. This delightful fusion of music and animation promises to bring a smile to your face and a tune to your heart!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
